verses.verse: Bel <S%H1078><s%> boweth <S%H3766>down<s%>, <S%H5015>Nebo<s%> <S%H7164>stoopeth<s%>; their <S%H6091>idols<s%> are upon the <S%H2416>beasts<s%>, and upon the <S%H929>cattle<s%>: the things that ye <S%H5385>carried<s%> about are made a <S%H6006>load<s%>, a <S%H4853>burden<s%> to the weary <S%H5889>beast<s%>.

They <S%H7164>stoop<s%>, they bow <S%H3766>down<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>; they <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H4422>deliver<s%> the <S%H4853>burden<s%>, but <S%H5315>themselves<s%> are <S%H1980>gone<s%> into <S%H7628>captivity<s%>.

Hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H1004>me<s%>, O house of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and all the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, that have been <S%H6006>borne<s%> by me from their <S%H990>birth<s%>, that have been <S%H5375>carried<s%> from the <S%H7356>womb<s%>;

and even to old <S%H2209>age<s%> I am <S%H7872>he<s%>, and even to hoar hairs will I <S%H5445>carry<s%> <S%H6213>you<s%>; I have made, and I will <S%H5375>bear<s%>; <S%H5445>yea<s%>, I will carry, and will <S%H4422>deliver<s%>.
To whom will ye <S%H1819>like<s%> <S%H7737>me<s%>, and make me equal, and <S%H4911>compare<s%> <S%H1819>me<s%>, that we may be like?

Such as <S%H2107>lavish<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> out of the <S%H3599>bag<s%>, and <S%H8254>weigh<s%> <S%H3701>silver<s%> in the <S%H7070>balance<s%>, they <S%H7936>hire<s%> a <S%H6884>goldsmith<s%>, and he <S%H6213>maketh<s%> it a <S%H410>god<s%>; they fall <S%H5456>down<s%>, <S%H7812>yea<s%>, they worship.

They <S%H5375>bear<s%> it upon the <S%H3802>shoulder<s%>, they <S%H5445>carry<s%> <S%H3240>it<s%>, and set it in its place, and it <S%H5975>standeth<s%>, from its <S%H4725>place<s%> shall it not <S%H4185>remove<s%>: <S%H6817>yea<s%>, one may cry unto <S%H6030>it<s%>, yet can it not answer, nor <S%H3467>save<s%> him out of his <S%H6869>trouble<s%>.
Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H377>this<s%>, and show yourselves men; bring it <S%H7725>again<s%> to <S%H3820>mind<s%>, O ye <S%H6586>transgressors<s%>.
Remember <S%H2142><s%> the former <S%H7223>things<s%> of <S%H5769>old<s%>: for I am <S%H410>God<s%>, and there is none <S%H430>else<s%>; I am God, and there is <S%H657>none<s%> like <S%H3644>me<s%>;

declaring <S%H5046><s%> the <S%H319>end<s%> from the <S%H7225>beginning<s%>, and from ancient <S%H6924>times<s%> things that are not yet <S%H6213>done<s%>; <S%H559>saying<s%>, My <S%H6098>counsel<s%> shall <S%H6965>stand<s%>, and I will <S%H6213>do<s%> all my <S%H2656>pleasure<s%>;

calling <S%H7121><s%> a ravenous <S%H5861>bird<s%> from the <S%H4217>east<s%>, the <S%H376>man<s%> of my <S%H6098>counsel<s%> from a <S%H4801>far<s%> <S%H776>country<s%>; <S%H1696>yea<s%>, I have spoken, I will also <S%H935>bring<s%> it to <S%H3335>pass<s%>; I have purposed, I will also do <S%H6213>it<s%>.
Hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H47>me<s%>, ye stout-hearted, that are far <S%H7350>from<s%> <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>:

I bring <S%H7126>near<s%> my <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, it shall not be far <S%H7368>off<s%>, and my <S%H8668>salvation<s%> shall not <S%H309>tarry<s%>; and I will <S%H5414>place<s%> <S%H8668>salvation<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel<s%> my <S%H8597>glory<s%>.
